long_description: Big and bold, the Spy Discord Sunglasses for men let you make whatever statement you want on the beach or out on the town, any time of year. Gray lenses with a blue spectra finish block about 87% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are highly impact resistant.
short_description: Big and bold, the Spy Discord Sunglasses for men let you make whatever statement you want on the beach or out on the town, any time of year.
